channel.title: Can't Compile or Run Server
channel.description:
Every time I try to run the server I get this: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<Unknown Source> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged<Native Method> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal<Unknown Source> [/code]
Also when I try to compile this comes up: [img]http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/4224/commandtv5.jpg[/img]
I've tried multiple compilers that have worked fine for others.
lol??? :confused: :confused: :confused: If anybody could help that would be great and I will love you forever.
Sorry if this is a dumb question, but I'm new to this and this section is for questions is it not?
I'm guessing it's a problem with my Java, but I have JDK 6u6 and I don't see the reason why it's not working.

item.title: Can't Compile or Run Server
item.dc:creator: @Get_Ic3d Get Ic3d
item.description:
@Get_Ic3d wrote:

No, here are my paths as of now.

CLASSPATH

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

PATH

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;

did you clear your path and classpath?

Every time I try to run the server I get this:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<Unknown Source> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged<Native Method> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal<Unknown Source>

Also when I try to compile this comes up:

I’ve tried multiple compilers that have worked fine for others.

lol???
If anybody could help that would be great and I will love you forever.

Sorry if this is a dumb question, but I’m new to this and this section is for questions is it not?
